Summary: 2 Flying blinking lights recorded during night with Night Vision
divs: Sighting DetailsFor the last few months I am recording during night the sky with my night vision. I am sleeping during the recordings but I am checking these recordings the following day. I am recording a lot of meteors and planes. During the night of October 28, 2013 in the little village Cernovice u Tabora in South Bohemia I did a recording of two flying and blinking objects with two different shapes that do not look to me as airplanes. The date and time on the video recordings are not correct for unknown reasons. I do see airplanes in this region so maybe these are just ordinary airplanes. I don't know. I did not witness it myself. I will continue to do my nightvision recordings.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Černovice
This sighting has never been favorited.
